ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Haste
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, better remember to put the ;-p sign out. ;-) I was kidding.  That would be the logical condition that would allow both of Verant s statements to be true
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, better remember to put the ;-p sign out. ;-)

I was kidding. That would be the logical condition that would allow both of
Verant's statements to be true however.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 10, 2000 11:50 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Haste


I dont think greater heal/ stun/ hp and ac buffs are fluff. And thats just
the paladins. I'm not sure what combat spells SK's and Rangers use (I dont
recognize them, as I recogzine the cleric spells paladins cast since I play
a cleric too)
